reasoning: The test reveals multiple server-side issues: API endpoints returning 500 errors with 'page state changed' messages indicates a real synchronization bug, and the Content Approval workflow failing to persist after being saved represents a genuine data persistence bug - not a test setup issue.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows Direct Publish workflow (Publish/Discard buttons) instead of Content Approval workflow controls. Test observations document 500 errors from Publish/Discard API endpoints and workflow settings that fail to persist when saved, indicating server-side bugs rather than test configuration problems.
scenario_id: DNN_HTML::Content Approval Process::Submit content for approval
